headline.main: FRENCH LINK MASONS WITH ROTARY CLUBS; Vichy Investigator Charges U.S. Influence in Societies

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 17 -- Many members of Rotary Clubs are unware that they are in any way connected with Masonry, but documents found in the French Masonic headquarters have established that a definite influence exists, according to a statement made to the press in Vichy today by Bernard Fay, librarian of the French National Library.
abstract: B Fay on document linking Rotary Clubs with Masonry
